9.verification_summary: The claim follows from standard Poisson counting for observed counts n(x) with n = p(x) delta x T, giving p_hat = n/(T delta x); hence absolute error ~ sqrt(n)/(T delta x) equals sqrt(p_hat/(T delta x)) and relative error ~ 1/sqrt(p_hat T delta x), which increases as p_hat decreases.
